line.comment: * ZH 1.10 - the Player cannot use infected OCV ships to fight Terraformer targets. If he tries his ships will turn immediately.
* if NPCs are ever able to build OCV ships too we might want to restrict this to player only
* all OCV ship designs in the same sector are now also turning into OCV. Including docked ships
* we also stop the OCV virus task on the other ships
* Turn into OCV and start a team of invaders

line.text: 's hate that you put OCV ships so close to them! ('

sval.val: s hate that you put OCV ships so close to them! (
ZH 1.10 - the Player cannot use infected OCV ships to fight Terraformer targets. If he tries his ships will turn immediately.
if NPCs are ever able to build OCV ships too we might want to restrict this to player only
all OCV ship designs in the same sector are now also turning into OCV. Including docked ships
we also stop the OCV virus task on the other ships
Turn into OCV and start a team of invaders
